short_summary: -pre-engineered steel building for warehouse and locker storage purposes
description: -A TWO PHASE SELECTION PROCESS WILL TAKE PLACE TO DETERMINE THE SUCCESSFUL CONTRACTOR.
full_summary:
**Title**: Building 25 Pre-Engineered Metal Building in Steveston, Richmond, BC.

**Reference Number**: PW-22-01006676

**Tender Closing Date**: 27th September 2022, 13:00:00
The tender is closed.

**Government Agency**: Fisheries and Oceans Canada
**Contact Information**:
- Name: Kimberly Walker
- Job Title: Tenders Department, Fisheries and Oceans Canada
- Contact Email: [DFOtenders-soumissionsMPO@dfo-mpo.gc.ca](mailto:DFOtenders-soumissionsMPO@dfo-mpo.gc.ca)
- Contact Address: 200 Kent St, Station 13E228, Ottawa, Ontario, Canada, K1A 0E6

**Notice Background**:
The bid invitation is part of a two-phase selection process. Phase 1 involves evaluating the qualifications of all potential contractors, while Phase 2 will be limited to those contractors that went through Phase 1 and invited to provide a financial bid. Contracts awarded in Phase 2 will not be eligible for the pre-qualification list.

**Government Requirement**:
Part of Fisheries and Oceans Canada's Small Craft Harbours (SCH), a new pre-engineered steel building is required to serve as a warehouse and locker storage. The building should be approximately 1,430 square meters in size and installed in Steveston, Richmond, British Columbia.

**Trade Agreement**:
The contract is covered by the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

**Documentation**:
Details of the tender invitation can be found at [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/09/09/51ad2cb613b593971e08aea12fc069c3/30003379_-_request_for_qualification_-_steveston_british_columbia_en.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/09/09/51ad2cb613b593971e08aea12fc069c3/30003379_-_request_for_qualification_-_steveston_british_columbia_en.pdf) (English) and [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/09/09/0ff038f69999b92151bc3f9089bff0a2/30003379_-_request_for_qualification_-_steveston_brit
